word: Your case has been presented before me, and I have felt very anxious for you. . . . Satan has been watching you closely. Only a little farther on his ground, and the Spirit of God would have been driven forever from your heart, the Lord would have left you, and Satan, cruel in his power, would have cut you off in your sins.--Letter 46, 1888, p. 1. (To Brother Frisbie, December 30, 1888.)
